mean_cn: n. 公羊，撞锤，【计】随机存取内存；  v. 猛击，撞
mean_en: is the part of a computer in which information is stored while you are using it. RAM is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'Random Access Memory'.
sentence: This computer will need more RAM if you want to play your favorite games.
sentence_trans: 如果你想玩你最爱的游戏，这台电脑就需要更多随机存取内存。
